duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business-to-business sales efforts.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, managing multiple touchpoints and fostering client relationships.
Utilize persuasive communication and networking skills to promote and sell products and services to business owners.
Maintain and grow client relationships to drive future revenue growth.
Participate in critical business discussions and use custom CRM platform for client acquisition.
Engage in face-to-face sales meetings and networking activities to build a fast-growing portfolio.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
